channel.title: 2h and shields. Help
channel.description:
Ok, i've searched and have not found the answer to my question.
I can make it, if i'm wearing a shield and use a 2h, and shield is removed, that bit was easy. But, i can put a shield back on after, and here is my problem.
So if anyone knows how i can make it so i cannot equip a shield, or the weapon is removed once a shield is added, i would be very very grateful!
Thanks in advance, too whoever can help me :)
~Foz

item.title: 2h and shields. Help

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

something in item.java i think it’s when it loads on of the .dats
